Dark theme reduces power consumption and is more comfortable for the eyes
Adjust according to the system settings
Change theme color based on the wallpaper
Visit app\'s GitHub repository to report issues or contribute

SunnahApp is a free and open-source app to read and explore the Sunnah of the Prophet ﷺ. This app has a nice and clean interface with features like translation, advanced search, reminder and many more. 

DOWNLOAD NOW:
%s
Horizontal — Hadiths are scrollable left and right.\nVertical — Hadiths are scrollable up and down.
Show the chain of narrators in Hadith texts
Are you sure you want to delete this collection?
No hadiths in this collection. You can organize your favorite hadiths into collections for easy access.
Are you sure you want to delete this collection? All your saved hadiths in this collection will be deleted.

Hadith reference has been copied to clipboard. Please paste it in the GitHub issue.
Use this option to download Hadith resources from a different source if one is not working.
Get a daily reminder for Hadith.
Please allow notification permission to receive daily Hadith reminders.
To use this feature, please download at least one Hadith collection first.
